About this capture
COLLECTED BY
Organization: Alexa Crawls
Starting in 1996, Alexa Internet has been donating their crawl data to the Internet Archive. Flowing in every day, these data are added to the Wayback Machine after an embargo period.
Collection: alexa_web_2009
this data is currently not publicly accessible.
TIMESTAMPS

News: December 2008
Paramount Internet recently contracted Client Managers due to increased sales and more contacts. These Client Managers are also contacting new Clients. Read more...
News: November 2008
Paramount Internet rolls out a division of ebooks located at showmemyebooks.com This website, holding hundreds of ebooks, sells them for only $1 or less each via payment thru Paypal and instant download. Read more...
Welcome to Paramount Internet
"Put it in our hands and let us do the work" -that has always been our motto.
You have a business, you don't need to track down website problems, locate a designer, retrieve lost passwords, etc, etc.
When you have a problem, we want you to say "Paramount Internet will fix it, let's give them a call" or call one of us by name -"Get Jeff at Paramount Internet, he's our Web guy". You have a business to run. We work for you and are ready when you need us.

Website Design
You don't have to know computers. We speak both Techy and English. Our job is to make your website reach your customers. Whether the site is located in search engines or catches the eyes of your customers. Our customer support is available by phone or email, giving you the best experience.



Website Hosting

Paramount Internet provides Website Hosting, from the basic shared to large e-commerce Dedicated Servers. We give you a very user friendly Windows-based Control Panel to manage all of your own emails, FTP, traffic, where they come from, and much more. All accounts come with this service. We are confident that you will enjoy this experience.
